question: Some people think that more money should be spent on protecting endangered species while others think it is a waste of valuable money. What is your opinion?
text: Saving different kind of genes throughout the human life has been increasing enormously in our day to day life. Some people argue that it’s better to invest funds on the endangered collections while, others think it’s all a waste of their pocket money. Well, I completely agree with investing on those rare categories in our environment ecosystem.

People believe that, in order to take care of the endangered breeds it’s costing them a lot in terms of their daily time consumption and their valuable resources. Although they are not net new types to them and they already had great experience with those species and by knowing about them. In a recent report, published by prestigious New York Times magazine about the percentage of drastic change in the various types of categories. Despite their regular activities to look after for their loved genes, it’s stubborn to them.
